segment.target: Botanist

Capable of distinguishing the characteristics of the various plants and fruits. They are also equally effective when maintaining the garden.// :point: Can read **fruit nutrition information**.// :point: Can read **plant properties**.// :point: Can carry out **transplants**.// :point: +2 :pa_garden: per day (**Gardening** Action Points).// :point: Expedition: The **Harvest** event yields an additional fruit.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Firefighter

The Firefighter has great experience which means they will always succeed when using the extinguisher... and they can also make it without an extinguisher!// :point: The **Extinguish Fire** action is always successful.// :point: Enables the action **Extinguish Manually**.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Pilot
Radio Expert

The radio expert can decode the most complicated jumble of spatial waves in order to rebuild or send messages to the other end of the universe.// :point: **Twice as effective** at establishing **contact** with Sol.// :point: Improves the quality of teammates' attempts to **contact** Sol by 50% when theyâ€™re in the same room.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Robotics Expert

The robotics expert can create and operate drones in any way they see fit.// :point: Starts out with a **drone blueprint**.// :point: Can **upgrade drones**.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Physicist

The physicist is a high flier in the field of physics research. Their understanding of quantum mechanics and even the essence of the strings that make up our universe is their major talent. They also have the advantage when repairing PILGRED.// :point: +1 :pa_pilgred: per day (**PILGRED repair** Action Point).// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Technician

Qualified to repair materials, equipment and the hull of the Daedalus.// :point: +1 :pa_eng: per day (**Repair** Action Point).// :point: Can **Dismantle** objects.// :point: Chances to perform successful **Repairs** doubled.// :point: Chances to perform successful **Renovations** doubled.// :point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Astrophysicist

Skilled in scanning for planets in range or to determine their composition.//:point: The **Scan** action costs 1 less :pa:.//:point:The **Analyze** action discovers one additional planet property.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
IT Expert

The IT Expert is at home as soon as they are in front of a screen. They manipulate the nexus, navigation and communications terminals with ease.//:point: +2 :pa_comp: per day (**IT** Action Points).//:point: Chances of success are doubled when using the **Hacker Kit**.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Designer
Has access to NERON's core twice per day (Free Actions).//:point: +2 :pa_core: per day (**NERON projects** Action Points)//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Creative

Sometimes you need to think outside the box.//:point: Every time you fail in an attempt to do something, there is a 50% chance of regaining **1** :pa:.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Shrink

The Shrink is in charge of psychological support. They are able to keep morale high and treat psychological illnesses.//:point: Each cycle, **1 Morale Point (:pmo:) is regained** by all crewmates lying down in the same room.//:point: **Treats psychological illnesses**.//:point: Grants the **Comfort** Action for raising morale.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Caffeine Junkie

The Caffeine Junkie is twice as effective as their colleagues when they have access to the coffee machine.//:point: +2 :pa: when they drink a **Coffee**.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Shooter

At ease handling all kinds of weapons.//:point: +2 :pa_shoot: per day (**Shoot** Action Points).//:point: Expedition: +1 to combat strength, if you have a gun.//:point: Bonus for developing certain ** NERON projects **.
Chef

Formidable when it comes to knocking meals together. They also have an impressive awareness of what you should eat.//:point: Can read **food nutrition information**.//:point: Can read **fruit nutrition information**.//:point: +4 :pa_cook: per day (**Cooking** Action Points).//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Nurse
Always ready to help.//:point: +1 :pa_heal: every day (**Heal** Action Point).//:point: Can read **properties of medicines**.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Paranoid

The Paranoid crewmember always believes their crewmates to be potentially dangerous, they always watch their back using their extra cameras.//Starts out with 2 additional **cameras**.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
Biologist

Highly skilled in laboratory research.//:point: Can read **properties of medicines**.//:point: **+4% bonus** of all **Research** in the laboratory.//:point: Bonus for developing certain **NERON projects**.
